sentences.sentence: I used to prefer Macs, and I have a Mac, but I kind of like the dorkiness of the P. C .
sentences.translation: 我曾经很喜欢苹果，并且拥有一台，但是我现在开始喜欢P.C 。那种笨笨的感觉。

sentences.sentence: I used to prefer Macs, and I have a Mac, but I kind of like the dorkiness of the P. C. commercials.
sentences.translation: 我曾经很喜欢苹果，并且拥有一台，但是我现在开始喜欢P.C。那种笨笨的感觉。（翻译不靠谱）
